thread.title: Energy sector off more than 3%, biggest S&P 500 loser
thread.title_full: Energy sector off more than 3%, biggest S&P 500 loser - MarketWatch

author: Sue Chang
title: Energy sector off more than 3%, biggest S&P 500 loser
text:
The energy sector topped the S&P 500 losers on Tuesday, dragging on the large cap index as crude-oil prices slumped in the wake of weak data out of China. All energy stocks in the S&P 500 were in the red with Noble Energy Inc. NBL, -6.88% and Ensco Plc ESV, -5.63% among notable decliners. October West Texas Intermediate crude CLV5, -9.27% dropped $2.79, or 5.7%, to $46.43 a barrel on the New York Mercantile Exchange. The S&P 500 SPX, -2.96% slid 1.7% to 1,938.71 as of mid-day.
Read the full story: Dow sinks more than 300 points as weak China data rattles U.S. stocks
